documentation.text: @dev Computes and returns the amount of LP tokens of type `token` that will be received in exchange for an `amount` of the underlying.

addUsableToken(address).details: There is a separate check for whether the usable token (i.e. deposit token)      is swappable for some action token.
addUsableToken(address).notice: Add a new deposit token that is supported by the action.

params.token: Address of deposit token that can be used by the action.

execute(address,address,address,bytes32).notice: See overloaded version of `execute` for more details.

execute(address,address,address,bytes32,.details: pool and vault funds are rebalanced after withdrawal for top up
execute(address,address,address,bytes32,.notice: Successfully tops up a position if it's conditions are met.

params.account: Account owning the position for top up.
params.beneficiary: Address of the keeper's wallet for fee accrual.
params.maxWeiForGas: the maximum extra amount of wei that the keeper is willing to pay for the gas
params.payer: Account that pays for the top up.
params.protocol: Protocol of the top up position.

executeActionFee().details: Needs to be called after the update was prepared. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeActionFee().notice: Execute action fee update (with time delay enforced).

executeEstimatedGasUsage().notice: Execute update of gas usage (with time delay enforced).

executeFeeHandler().details: Needs to be called after the update was prepraed. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeFeeHandler().notice: Execute update of fee handler (with time delay enforced).

executeSwapperSlippage().details: Needs to be called after the update was prepared. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeSwapperSlippage().notice: Execute swapper slippage update (with time delay enforced).

executeTopUpHandler(bytes32).details: Needs to be called after the update was prepared. Fails if called before time delay is met.
executeTopUpHandler(bytes32).notice: Execute top up handler update (with time delay enforced).

params.protocol: Protocol for which a new handler should be executed.

getEstimatedGasUsage().notice: returns the current estimated gas usage

getEthRequiredForGas(address).notice: Computes the total amount of ETH (as wei) required to pay for all the top-ups assuming the maximum gas price and the current estimated gas usage of a top-up

getHealthFactor(bytes32,address).notice: Check if action can be executed.

params.account: for which to get the health factor
params.protocol: for which to get the health factor

getPosition(address,address,bytes32).notice: Get the record for a position.

params.protocol: Protocol where the position is held.

getSwapperSlippage().notice: Returns the current max swapper slippage

getTopUpHandler(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the topup handler for the given `protocol`

getUsableTokens().details: This refers to all tokens that can be used as deposit tokens.
getUsableTokens().notice: Get a list of all tokens usable for this action.

returns._0: Array of addresses of usable tokens.

getUserPositions(address).notice: Returns a list of positions for the given payer

isUsable(address).notice: Check whether a token is usable as a deposit token.

returns._0: True if token is usable as a deposit token for this action.

prepareEstimatedGasUsage(uint256).notice: Prepare update of estimated gas usage.

prepareTopUpHandler(bytes32,address).details: Setting the addres to 0 means that the protocol will no longer be supported.
prepareTopUpHandler(bytes32,address).notice: Prepare new top up handler fee update.

params.protocol: Protocol for which a new handler should be prepared.

register(address,bytes32,uint128,(uint64.details: The `depositAmount` must be greater or equal to the `totalTopUpAmount` (which is denominated in `actionToken`).

params.depositAmount: Amount of `depositToken` that will be locked.
params.protocol: Protocol which holds position to be topped up.
params.record: containing the data for the position to register

resetPosition(address,bytes32,bool).notice: Delete a position to back on the given protocol for `account`.

params.protocol: Protocol the position is held on.
params.unstake: If the tokens should be unstaked from vault.

resetTopUpHandler(bytes32).notice: Reset new top up handler deadline for a protocol.

params.protocol: Protocol for which top up handler deadline should be reset.
